result.title: Topcoder: Problem Writers and SRM Editorial Writers
result.content:
Hi All, We are looking for Problem Writers for Topcoder Contests.

Fill this google form if you are interested: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/11Dn5QFQ4_dutsrCXV5p-wvNwHeXJ6eZgK8kRu-CTaQM/.

You can also win a Trip to TCO18 Finals: http://tco18.topcoder.com/win-a-trip/algorithm-problem-writer-incentive/ Stage 4 begins tomorrow.

SRM Editorial Writers: As we did in the past we will be paying $100 to the member for writing the editorial of a match. You can reach out to me at harshit@topcoder.com for the same.

Feel free to reach out to Tim(tim@copilots.topcoder.com) or me(harshit@topcoder.com) in case of any queries or suggestions.

Please share this with anyone you think would be interested in writing problems or editorials for Topcoder SRMs and TCO Rounds :)
